page.html:
Yellowcake is an opinionated starter project created by Thrive Digital a Gold Coast Web Design studio. to help you create lightning fast websites with Gatsby and Netlify CMS.

View the project overview and the docs.

Features

  • Gatsby static site generator
  • Netlify CMS for content management
  • Dynamic menus and forms
  • Mailchimp and Uploadcare integrations
  • Fully responsive layout for mobile and widescreen browsing
  • Blog searching and paging functionality
  • Seamless image and content sliders

Get started

View the Netlify CMS Docs and the Netlify CMS Repo.
